pageContext.claim: “He's probably been using his friend, the so-called professor who now turns out to have FBI clearance, which he never said. He even lied about that because he never said that in Congress.”
pageContext.analysis: It's not a lie to not mention something if not asked. Comey never tried to hide his gambit and said he leaked details of his conversation with Trump with the express purpose of hoping to trigger the appointment of a special prosecutor.
